content.rendered:
Pharm. Obiasogu Okechukwu Ethelbert obtained a bachelors and a masters degree in pharmacy, he was also a member of PSN and PCN.

Pharm. Obiasogu Okechukwu Ethelbert was the H.O.D of General Hospital Egbema 2006-2008 and also the former H.O.D of Pharmacy Technician IMCOHAMS 2013-2018 before he was made the Provost of Imo State College of Health and Management Science Amaigbo in July 2019 until date.

Within 6 months, he was able to achieve the following:

  1. Building of Stadium
  2. 5 Geepee Tanks.
  3. Construction of intra network roads in the School
  4. Building of E-library settings of 275 computers.
  5. Purchasing of a new 75 KVA generator set for the School
  6. Building of Culverts, as to control erosion menace.
  7. Repairs of Hostels, Classroom Blocks, Offices etc.
  8. Building of 275 sitter computer systems in the School for JAMB    purposes.
  9. Building a Holding ground for the ICT Center.
  10. Addition of an office for the NBTE purposes.
  11. Changing of the School nomenclature from the present “IMO STATE COLLEGE OF HEALTH AND MANAGEMENT SCIENCES” to “IMO STATE COLLEGE OF HEALTH SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY”.
  12. Construction of the Analogue library – which is under construction.
  13. Construction of New Offices that is still under construction.
  14. Purchases of 5 extra 1000 liters of GP tanks.
  15. Constant supply of water.

Pharm. Obiasogu Okechukwu Ethelbert hails from Edenta Awo-Idemili Orsu L.G.A.
